history.created_by: RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         apt-utils         locales         ca-certificates         wget         man         git         flex         ssh         sudo         vim         luarocks         munge         lcov         ccache         lua5.2         python3-dev         python3-pip         valgrind         jq &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         build-essential         pkg-config         autotools-dev         libtool 	libffi-dev         autoconf         automake         make         clang         clang-tidy         gcc         g++ &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c pip install --upgrade --ignore-installed         "markupsafe==2.0.0"         coverage cffi ply six pyyaml "jsonschema>=2.6,<4.0"         sphinx sphinx-rtd-theme sphinxcontrib-spelling # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         libsodium-dev         libzmq3-dev         libczmq-dev         libjansson-dev         libmunge-dev         libncursesw5-dev         liblua5.2-dev         liblz4-dev         libsqlite3-dev         uuid-dev         libhwloc-dev         libs3-dev         libevent-dev         libarchive-dev         libpam-dev &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         faketime         libfaketime         pylint         cppcheck         enchant-2         aspell         aspell-en &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/openpmix/openpmix.git &&     git clone https://github.com/openpmix/prrte.git &&     ls -l &&     set -x &&     cd openpmix &&     git checkout fefaed568f33bf86f28afb6e45237f1ec5e4de93 &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --disable-static && make -j 4 install &&     ldconfig &&     cd .. &&     cd prrte &&     git checkout 477894f4720d822b15cab56eee7665107832921c &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr && make -j 4 install &&     cd ../.. &&     rm -rf prrte # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c CCACHE_DISABLE=1 &&     V=$FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION &&     PKG=flux-security-$V &&     URL=https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-security/releases/download &&     wget ${URL}/v${V}/${PKG}.tar.gz &&     tar xvfz ${PKG}.tar.gz &&     cd ${PKG} &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc || cat config.log &&     make -j 4 &&     make install &&     cd .. &&     rm -rf flux-security-* # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /var/run/munge &&     dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1 count=1024 > /etc/munge/munge.key &&     chown -R munge /etc/munge/munge.key /var/run/munge &&     chmod 600 /etc/munge/munge.key # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-core/releases/download/v0.61.2/flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     cd flux-core-0.61.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make clean &&     make &&     sudo make install # buildkit
RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get update # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends 	libboost-graph-dev 	libboost-system-dev 	libboost-filesystem-dev 	libboost-regex-dev 	libyaml-cpp-dev 	libedit-dev         libboost-dev         libyaml-cpp-dev 	curl # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c curl -s -L https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v$CMAKE/cmake-$CMAKE-linux-x86_64.sh > cmake.sh &&     sudo sh cmake.sh --prefix=/usr/local --skip-license # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-sched/releases/download/v0.33.1/flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     cd flux-sched-0.33.1 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make &&     sudo make install &&     ldconfig # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y fftw3-dev fftw3 pdsh         openssh-client openssh-server         dnsutils telnet strace git g++         unzip bzip2 # buildkit
RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y         libibverbs-dev         librdmacm-dev         rdma-core # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c git clone -b v1.21.1 https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric.git /opt/libfabric &&     cd libfabric && ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --enable-efa=yes --enable-tcp=yes --enable-udp=yes --enable-sockets=yes --enable-verbs=yes --enable-shm=yes --enable-mrail=yes --enable-rxd=yes --enable-rxm=yes &&     make -j 4 && make install # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://download.open-mpi.org/release/open-mpi/v4.1/openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     cd openmpi-4.1.2 &&     ./configure --with-ofi=/usr/local &&     make -j 4 && make install && ldconfig # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y libc6-dev &&     export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -j 4 -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/mfem/mfem/archive/refs/tags/v4.7.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v4.7.tar.gz &&     mv mfem-4.7 /opt/mfem &&     cd /opt/mfem &&     unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH &&     make config MFEM_USE_MPI=YES MPICXX=mpiCC MFEM_MPI_NP=2 MFEM_DEBUG=${DEBUG} CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS}" &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/CEED/Laghos/archive/refs/tags/v3.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v3.1.tar.gz &&     mv Laghos-3.1 /opt/laghos &&     cd /opt/laghos &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c export VERSION="1.1.0" &&     curl -LO "https://github.com/oras-project/oras/releases/download/v${VERSION}/oras_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz" &&     mkdir -p oras-install/ &&     tar -zxf oras_${VERSION}_*.tar.gz -C oras-install/ &&     mv oras-install/oras /usr/local/bin/ &&     rm -rf oras_${VERSION}_*.tar.gz oras-install/ # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c dnf update -y && dnf clean all &&     dnf group install -y "Development Tools" &&     dnf config-manager --set-enabled powertools &&     dnf install -y epel-release # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c dnf install -y     cmake     munge     munge-devel     hwloc     hwloc-devel     pmix     pmix-devel     lua     lua-devel     lua-posix     libevent-devel     czmq-devel     jansson-devel     lz4-devel     sqlite-devel     ncurses-devel     libarchive-devel     libxml2-devel     yaml-cpp-devel     boost-devel     libedit-devel     nfs-utils     python3-devel     python3-cffi     python3-yaml     python3-jsonschema     python3-sphinx     python3-docutils     aspell     aspell-en     valgrind-devel     wget     jq # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c groupadd -g 1004 flux &&     useradd -u 1004 -g 1004 -M -r -s /bin/false -c "flux-framework identity" flux # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c dnf install -y grubby &&     grubby --update-kernel=ALL --args="systemd.unified_cgroup_hierarchy=1" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-core.git &&     git clone https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-security.git &&     git clone https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-pmix.git # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c cd /usr/share/flux-security &&     ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc  &&     make -j 4 && make install # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /var/run/munge &&     dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1 count=1024 > munge.key &&     mv munge.key /etc/munge/munge.key &&     chown -R munge /etc/munge/munge.key /var/run/munge &&     chmod 600 /etc/munge/munge.key # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c cd /usr/share/flux-core &&     ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --with-flux-security &&     make clean &&     make -j 4 && make install # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c cd /usr/share &&     wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-sched/releases/download/v0.33.1/flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     cd flux-sched-0.33.1 &&     ln $(which python3) /usr/bin/python &&     PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make -j 4 && make install && ldconfig # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/openpmix/openpmix.git &&     git clone https://github.com/openpmix/prrte.git &&     ls -l &&     set -x &&     cd openpmix &&     git checkout fefaed568f33bf86f28afb6e45237f1ec5e4de93 &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --disable-static && make -j 4 install &&     ldconfig &&     cd .. &&     cd prrte &&     git checkout 477894f4720d822b15cab56eee7665107832921c &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr && make -j 4 install &&     cd ../.. &&     rm -rf prrte && set +x # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c cd /usr/share/flux-pmix &&     ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc  &&     make -j4  &&     make install # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c cd /tmp && wget https://download.open-mpi.org/release/open-mpi/v4.1/openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     cd openmpi-4.1.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr/local &&     make -j4 && make install && ldconfig # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c dnf update -y && dnf groupinstall -y "Development Tools" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/mfem/mfem/archive/refs/tags/v4.7.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v4.7.tar.gz &&     mv mfem-4.7 /opt/mfem &&     cd /opt/mfem &&     unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH &&     make config MFEM_USE_MPI=YES MPICXX=mpiCC MFEM_MPI_NP=2 MFEM_DEBUG=${DEBUG} CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS}" &&     make # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/CEED/Laghos/archive/refs/tags/v3.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v3.1.tar.gz &&     mv Laghos-3.1 /opt/laghos &&     cd /opt/laghos &&     make # buildkit

Env: NVIDIA_REQUIRE_CUDA=cuda>=12.4 brand=tesla,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=unknown,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=nvidia,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=nvidiartx,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=geforce,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=geforcertx,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=quadro,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=quadrortx,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=titan,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=titanrtx,driver>=470,driver<471 brand=tesla,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=unknown,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=nvidia,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=nvidiartx,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=geforce,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=geforcertx,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=quadro,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=quadrortx,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=titan,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=titanrtx,driver>=525,driver<526 brand=tesla,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=unknown,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=nvidia,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=nvidiartx,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=geforce,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=geforcertx,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=quadro,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=quadrortx,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=titan,driver>=535,driver<536 brand=titanrtx,driver>=535,driver<536

RUN |1 TARGETARCH=amd64 /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     gnupg2 curl ca-certificates &&     curl -fsSLO https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu2204/${NVARCH}/cuda-keyring_1.1-1_all.deb &&     dpkg -i cuda-keyring_1.1-1_all.deb &&     apt-get purge --autoremove -y curl     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |1 TARGETARCH=amd64 /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     cuda-cudart-12-4=${NV_CUDA_CUDART_VERSION}     ${NV_CUDA_COMPAT_PACKAGE}     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |1 TARGETARCH=amd64 /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     cuda-libraries-12-4=${NV_CUDA_LIB_VERSION}     ${NV_LIBNPP_PACKAGE}     cuda-nvtx-12-4=${NV_NVTX_VERSION}     libcusparse-12-4=${NV_LIBCUSPARSE_VERSION}     ${NV_LIBCUBLAS_PACKAGE}     ${NV_LIBNCCL_PACKAGE}     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |1 TARGETARCH=amd64 /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     cuda-cudart-dev-12-4=${NV_CUDA_CUDART_DEV_VERSION}     cuda-command-line-tools-12-4=${NV_CUDA_LIB_VERSION}     cuda-minimal-build-12-4=${NV_CUDA_LIB_VERSION}     cuda-libraries-dev-12-4=${NV_CUDA_LIB_VERSION}     cuda-nvml-dev-12-4=${NV_NVML_DEV_VERSION}     ${NV_NVPROF_DEV_PACKAGE}     ${NV_LIBNPP_DEV_PACKAGE}     libcusparse-dev-12-4=${NV_LIBCUSPARSE_DEV_VERSION}     ${NV_LIBCUBLAS_DEV_PACKAGE}     ${NV_LIBNCCL_DEV_PACKAGE}     ${NV_CUDA_NSIGHT_COMPUTE_DEV_PACKAGE}     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |1 TARGETARCH=amd64 /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     ${NV_CUDNN_PACKAGE}     ${NV_CUDNN_PACKAGE_DEV}     && apt-mark hold ${NV_CUDNN_PACKAGE_NAME}     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         apt-utils         locales         ca-certificates         wget         man         git         flex         ssh         sudo         vim         luarocks         munge         lcov         ccache         lua5.2         python3-dev         python3-pip         valgrind         jq &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c CCACHE_DISABLE=1 &&     V=$FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION &&     PKG=flux-security-$V &&     URL=https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-security/releases/download &&     wget ${URL}/v${V}/${PKG}.tar.gz &&     tar xvfz ${PKG}.tar.gz &&     cd ${PKG} &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc || cat config.log &&     make -j 4 &&     make install &&     cd .. &&     rm -rf flux-security-* # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /var/run/munge &&     dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1 count=1024 > /etc/munge/munge.key &&     chown -R munge /etc/munge/munge.key /var/run/munge &&     chmod 600 /etc/munge/munge.key # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-core/releases/download/v0.61.2/flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     cd flux-core-0.61.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make clean &&     make &&     sudo make install # buildkit
RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get update # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends 	libboost-graph-dev 	libboost-system-dev 	libboost-filesystem-dev 	libboost-regex-dev 	libyaml-cpp-dev 	libedit-dev         libboost-dev         libyaml-cpp-dev 	curl # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-sched/releases/download/v0.33.1/flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     cd flux-sched-0.33.1 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make &&     sudo make install &&     ldconfig # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y fftw3-dev fftw3 pdsh         openssh-client openssh-server         dnsutils telnet strace git g++         unzip bzip2 # buildkit
RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y         libibverbs-dev         librdmacm-dev         rdma-core # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c git clone -b v1.21.1 https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric.git /opt/libfabric &&     cd libfabric && ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --enable-efa=yes --enable-tcp=yes --enable-udp=yes --enable-sockets=yes --enable-verbs=yes --enable-shm=yes --enable-mrail=yes --enable-rxd=yes --enable-rxm=yes &&     make -j 4 && make install # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /usr/local/pancakes &&     wget https://download.open-mpi.org/release/open-mpi/v4.1/openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     cd openmpi-4.1.2 &&     ./configure --with-cuda --with-ofi=/usr/local --prefix=/usr/local/pancakes &&     make && make install # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y libc6-dev &&     export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -j 4 -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/mfem/mfem/archive/refs/tags/v4.7.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v4.7.tar.gz &&     mv mfem-4.7 /opt/mfem &&     cd /opt/mfem &&     make config MFEM_USE_MPI=YES MPICXX=mpiCC MFEM_MPI_NP=2 MFEM_DEBUG=${DEBUG} CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS}" &&     make -j 4 MFEM_BUILD=${MFEM_BUILD} # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/CEED/Laghos/archive/refs/tags/v3.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v3.1.tar.gz &&     mv Laghos-3.1 /opt/laghos &&     cd /opt/laghos &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c export VERSION="1.1.0" &&     curl -LO "https://github.com/oras-project/oras/releases/download/v${VERSION}/oras_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz" &&     mkdir -p oras-install/ &&     tar -zxf oras_${VERSION}_*.tar.gz -C oras-install/ &&     mv oras-install/oras /usr/local/bin/ &&     rm -rf oras_${VERSION}_*.tar.gz oras-install/ # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         apt-utils         locales         ca-certificates         wget         man         git         flex         ssh         sudo         vim         luarocks         munge         lcov         ccache         lua5.2         python3-dev         python3-pip         valgrind         jq &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         build-essential         pkg-config         autotools-dev         libtool 	libffi-dev         autoconf         automake         make         clang         clang-tidy         gcc         g++ &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c pip install --upgrade --ignore-installed         "markupsafe==2.0.0"         coverage cffi ply six pyyaml "jsonschema>=2.6,<4.0"         sphinx sphinx-rtd-theme sphinxcontrib-spelling # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         libsodium-dev         libzmq3-dev         libczmq-dev         libjansson-dev         libmunge-dev         libncursesw5-dev         liblua5.2-dev         liblz4-dev         libsqlite3-dev         uuid-dev         libhwloc-dev         libs3-dev         libevent-dev         libarchive-dev         libpam-dev &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends         faketime         libfaketime         pylint         cppcheck         enchant-2         aspell         aspell-en &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/openpmix/openpmix.git &&     git clone https://github.com/openpmix/prrte.git &&     ls -l &&     set -x &&     cd openpmix &&     git checkout fefaed568f33bf86f28afb6e45237f1ec5e4de93 &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --disable-static && make -j 4 install &&     ldconfig &&     cd .. &&     cd prrte &&     git checkout 477894f4720d822b15cab56eee7665107832921c &&     ./autogen.pl &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr && make -j 4 install &&     cd ../.. &&     rm -rf prrte # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c CCACHE_DISABLE=1 &&     V=$FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION &&     PKG=flux-security-$V &&     URL=https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-security/releases/download &&     wget ${URL}/v${V}/${PKG}.tar.gz &&     tar xvfz ${PKG}.tar.gz &&     cd ${PKG} &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc || cat config.log &&     make -j 4 &&     make install &&     cd .. &&     rm -rf flux-security-* # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c mkdir -p /var/run/munge &&     dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1 count=1024 > /etc/munge/munge.key &&     chown -R munge /etc/munge/munge.key /var/run/munge &&     chmod 600 /etc/munge/munge.key # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-core/releases/download/v0.61.2/flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     cd flux-core-0.61.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make clean &&     make &&     sudo make install # buildkit
RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get update # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c sudo apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends 	libboost-graph-dev 	libboost-system-dev 	libboost-filesystem-dev 	libboost-regex-dev 	libyaml-cpp-dev 	libedit-dev         libboost-dev         libyaml-cpp-dev 	curl # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c curl -s -L https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v$CMAKE/cmake-$CMAKE-linux-x86_64.sh > cmake.sh &&     sudo sh cmake.sh --prefix=/usr/local --skip-license # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-sched/releases/download/v0.33.1/flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     cd flux-sched-0.33.1 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make &&     sudo make install &&     ldconfig # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y fftw3-dev fftw3 pdsh libfabric-dev libfabric1         openssh-client openssh-server         dnsutils telnet strace git g++         unzip bzip2 # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget https://download.open-mpi.org/release/open-mpi/v4.1/openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf openmpi-4.1.2.tar.gz &&     cd openmpi-4.1.2 &&     ./configure &&     make && make install && ldconfig # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y libc6-dev &&     export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make # buildkit

RUN |1 FLUX_SECURITY_VERSION=0.11.0 /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c pip install cffi ply &&     wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-core/releases/download/v0.61.2/flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf flux-core-0.61.2.tar.gz &&     cd flux-core-0.61.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make clean &&     make -j 4 &&     make install && cd /opt && rm -rf flux-core-0.61.2 # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get -qq install -y --no-install-recommends 	libboost-graph-dev 	libboost-system-dev 	libboost-filesystem-dev 	libboost-regex-dev 	libyaml-cpp-dev 	libedit-dev         libboost-dev         libyaml-cpp-dev &&         apt-get clean # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c pip install jsonschema &&     wget https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-sched/releases/download/v0.33.1/flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf flux-sched-0.33.1.tar.gz &&     cd flux-sched-0.33.1 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc &&     make -j 4 &&     make install &&     ldconfig &&     cd /opt &&     rm -rf flux-sched-0.33.1 # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/flux-framework/flux-pmix /opt/flux-pmix &&     cd /opt/flux-pmix &&     ./autogen.sh &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr &&     make -j 4 &&     make install &&     cd /opt &&     rm -rf flux-pmix && rm -rf flux-*.tar.gz # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y libc6-dev &&     export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/mfem/mfem/archive/refs/tags/v4.7.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v4.7.tar.gz &&     mv mfem-4.7 /opt/mfem &&     cd /opt/mfem &&     make config MFEM_USE_MPI=YES MPICXX=mpiCC MFEM_MPI_NP=2 MFEM_DEBUG=${DEBUG} CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS}" &&     make MFEM_BUILD=${MFEM_BUILD} # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/CEED/Laghos/archive/refs/tags/v3.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v3.1.tar.gz &&     mv Laghos-3.1 /opt/laghos &&     cd /opt/laghos &&     make # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y git curl wget unzip gpg debian-archive-keyring ubuntu-keyring && apt-get clean # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c apt-get install -y libc6-dev &&     export hypre_options="--disable-fortran --without-fei" &&     wget --no-verbose https://github.com/hypre-space/hypre/archive/v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf v2.28.0.tar.gz &&     mv hypre-2.28.0 hypre &&     cd hypre/src &&    ./configure ${hypre_options} CC=mpicc CXX=mpic++ &&     make -j 4 # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget --no-verbose https://github.com/mfem/tpls/raw/gh-pages/metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     tar -xzf metis-4.0.3.tar.gz &&     mv metis-4.0.3 metis-4.0 &&     make -j 4 -C metis-4.0/Lib CC=mpicc OPTFLAGS="-Wno-error=implicit-function-declaration -O2" # buildkit

RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/mfem/mfem/archive/refs/tags/v4.7.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v4.7.tar.gz &&     mv mfem-4.7 /opt/mfem &&     cd /opt/mfem &&     unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH &&     make config MFEM_USE_MPI=YES MPICXX=mpiCC MFEM_MPI_NP=2 MFEM_DEBUG=${DEBUG} CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS}" &&     make -j 4 # buildkit
RUN /bin/sh -c wget https://github.com/CEED/Laghos/archive/refs/tags/v3.1.tar.gz &&     tar -xzvf v3.1.tar.gz &&     mv Laghos-3.1 /opt/laghos &&     cd /opt/laghos &&     make -j 4 # buildkit
